trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <see langword="<input type= submit>" /> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML <see langword="<input type= submit>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton> class and is used to create a button control on a Web page that submits a form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>類別衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton>類別，並且可用來建立送出表單的網頁上的按鈕控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> control is often used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset> control, which resets form controls to their initial values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>控制項則通常搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputReset>控制項，將表單控制項重設為其初始值。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the `<input type=submit>` HTML control declaratively on a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`<input type=submit>`以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的 HTML 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to add the same HTML control programmatically during a call to the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何在呼叫期間，以程式設計方式加入同一個 HTML 控制項`Page_Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The "submit" literal string.
trans-unit.target: 「 送出 「 常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> controls to a Web Forms page using default constructors to create a simple login screen.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>使用預設建構函式來建立簡單 登入畫面 Web Form 網頁的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The input button type.
trans-unit.target: 輸入按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> class using the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的型別，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `type` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit> controls to a Web Forms page to create a simple login screen.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputSubmit>控制項到 Web Form 頁面，以建立簡單 登入畫面。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how you can pass various values for the `type` parameter, which overrides the intrinsic type of the HTML control.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會示範如何將不同的值傳遞`type`參數，會覆寫內建 HTML 控制項的類型。
